org.fujion.chartjs.axis

Class CartesianAxisOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fujion.ancillary.Options
      • org.fujion.chartjs.axis.AxisOptions
        • org.fujion.chartjs.axis.CartesianAxisOptions
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IOptionMapTransform, IClientTransform
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CategoryAxisOptions, LinearAxisOptions, TimeAxisOptions

    public abstract class CartesianAxisOptions
extends AxisOptions
    Options common to all Cartesian axes.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      Boolean autoSkip
      If true, automatically calculates how many labels that can be shown and hides labels accordingly.
      Integer autoSkipPadding
      Padding between the ticks on the horizontal axis when autoSkip is enabled.
      GridLineOptions gridLines
      Grid line configuration.
      Integer labelOffset
      Distance in pixels to offset the label from the centre point of the tick (in the y direction for the x axis, and the x direction for the y axis).
      Integer maxRotation
      Maximum rotation for tick labels when rotating to condense labels.
      Integer minRotation
      Minimum rotation for tick labels.
      Boolean mirror
      Flips tick labels around axis, displaying the labels inside the chart instead of outside.
      Boolean offset
      If true, extra space is added to the both edges and the axis is scaled to fit into the chart area.
      Integer padding
      Padding between the tick label and the axis.
      PositionEnum position
      Position of the axis in the chart.
      ScaleLabelOptions scaleLabel
      Scale title configuration.

    • Field Detail

      • autoSkip

        @Option
public Boolean autoSkip
        If true, automatically calculates how many labels that can be shown and hides labels accordingly. Turn it off to show all labels no matter what.

        Default: true

      • autoSkipPadding

        @Option
public Integer autoSkipPadding
        Padding between the ticks on the horizontal axis when autoSkip is enabled. Note: Only applicable to horizontal scales.

        Default: 0

      • gridLines

        @Option
public final GridLineOptions gridLines
        Grid line configuration.

      • labelOffset

        @Option
public Integer labelOffset
        Distance in pixels to offset the label from the centre point of the tick (in the y direction for the x axis, and the x direction for the y axis). Note: this can cause labels at the edges to be cropped by the edge of the canvas.

        Default: 0

      • maxRotation

        @Option
public Integer maxRotation
        Maximum rotation for tick labels when rotating to condense labels. Note: Rotation doesn't occur until necessary. Note: Only applicable to horizontal scales.

        Default: 90

      • minRotation

        @Option
public Integer minRotation
        Minimum rotation for tick labels. Note: Only applicable to horizontal scales.

        Default: 0

      • mirror

        @Option
public Boolean mirror
        Flips tick labels around axis, displaying the labels inside the chart instead of outside. Note: Only applicable to vertical scales.

        Default: false

      • offset

        @Option
public Boolean offset
        If true, extra space is added to the both edges and the axis is scaled to fit into the chart area. This is set to true in the bar chart by default.

        Default: true for bar charts; false otherwise

      • padding

        @Option
public Integer padding
        Padding between the tick label and the axis. When set on a vertical axis, this applies in the horizontal (X) direction. When set on a horizontal axis, this applies in the vertical (Y) direction.

        Default: 10

      • position

        @Option
public PositionEnum position
        Position of the axis in the chart.

      • scaleLabel

        @Option
public final ScaleLabelOptions scaleLabel
        Scale title configuration.

      • type

        @Option
public String type
        Type of scale being employed. Custom scales can be created and registered with a string key. This allows changing the type of an axis for a chart.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CartesianAxisOptions

        public CartesianAxisOptions()
